snippet: Gov. Chris Christie is preparing to take his first concrete step toward a presidential campaign by setting up a PAC as early as this month, according to three supporters involved in the discussions.
abstract: Gov. Chris Christie is preparing to take his first concrete step toward a presidential campaign by setting up a PAC as early as this month, according to three supporters involved in the discussions.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and MICHAEL BARBARO

headline.main: Christie to Announce PAC as Republicans Eye Donors
headline.print_headline: In ’16 Sign, Christie Is Said to Be Forming PAC
